Job Title: Commercial Roofing Service Superintendent

Location: Clinton, MD

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Title: Commercial Roofing Service Superintendent
Company Overview: Progressive Roofing is a leading provider of commercial roofing solutions, dedicated to delivering high-quality services to our clients. With a strong commitment to excellence and a reputation for reliability, we take pride in our ability to meet and exceed the expectations of our diverse clientele.
Position Overview: We are seeking an experienced and skilled Commercial Roofing Service Superintendent to join our dynamic team based in Clinton, MD. The ideal candidate will play a crucial role in overseeing and coordinating all aspects of commercial roofing projects, ensuring they are completed safely, on time, and within budget.
Responsibilities:Project Management: Lead and manage commercial roofing projects from start to finish, ensuring adherence to project timelines and budgetary constraints.Team Leadership: Supervise and motivate roofing crews, fostering a positive and collaborative work environment.Quality Assurance: Monitor and enforce quality standards, ensuring that all roofing installations meet or exceed industry, manufacturer, and company specifications.Safety Compliance: Uphold strict safety standards on job sites, conducting regular safety meetings and implementing necessary measures to prevent accidents or injuries.Client Communication: Maintain open and transparent communication with clients, addressing concerns, providing updates, and ensuring customer satisfaction throughout the project lifecycle.Material and Equipment Management: Oversee the procurement and efficient use of materials and equipment, optimizing resources to maximize productivity.Problem Resolution: Address and resolve any issues or challenges that may arise during the construction process, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills.Documentation: Maintain accurate and detailed project documentation, including progress reports, daily logs, and any other necessary records.Qualifications:Experience: Minimum of ten (10) of experience in commercial roofing, with a proven track record of successful project management.Knowledge: Strong understanding of commercial roofing systems, materials, and installation methods.Leadership Skills: Demonstrated ability to lead and manage a team effectively, fostering a positive and collaborative work environment.Safety Focus: Commitment to upholding and enforcing safety standards on job sites.Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to interact professionally with clients, team members, and subcontractors.Problem-Solving: Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to make sound decisions in a fast-paced environment.Organizational Skills: Detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities simultaneously.
How to Apply: If you are a motivated and experienced Commercial Roofing Service Superintendent looking for a new and exciting opportunity, please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your relevant experience.
Progressive Roofing is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage applications from candidates of all backgrounds and experiences.
